text: 4:10 Aposel 2:24; 3:6; 3:13-16Eghtɨ ia ko Israelɨn itir darasi, ia bar moghɨra bizir kam gɨfogh! Kar Nasaretɨn gumazim Krais Iesusɨn ziamɨn, gumazir ian damazibar tughav itir kam ua dera. Gumazir kam a Iesus, ia a inigha ter ighuvim gafuzɨ, an aremezɨ God a gamizɨ a ua dɨkafi.4:10 Gumazir okoruar kam, Judabar Kaunselba, merara Pailat (Romɨn gavman faragha zuir gumazim) mɨgɨa ghaze, a Iesus mɨsueghtɨ an ovengegh. Nɨ Luk 22:66--23:5ɨn gan. Egha Iesus ovengegha gɨvazɨ, me gumazamiziba nɨghnɨzir gavgavimɨn an ikian me aghua.
